name: Volcarona
flavorText: A sea of fire engulfs the surroundings of their battles, since they use their six wings to scatter their ember scales.

abilities.name: Scorching Scales
abilities.text: Put 4 damage counters instead of 2 on your opponent's Burned Pokémon between turns.

attacks.name: Burning Wind
attacks.text: You may discard an Energy attached to this Pokémon. If you do, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned.
